review: Recipe on how to become an ♥♥♥.1) Buy Rust2) Hold a rock (rock provided in-game)3) Find the nearest person, sprint to them and scream into your microphone 'ROCK FIGHT!'4) Look at yourself in the mirror and watch yourself slowly deteriorate into an ♥♥♥.10/10 would bang again.
